posts.post_content:
Please send me a PM or email (ajrgroupny@gmail.com) if you own this Red Dooin printing error and would consider selling it.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=169575&d=1417293475[/IMG]

Thanks! Happy Holidays!

Aaron

There are a lot of other chemically altered cards in this scan (Bender, Krause, Konetchy) in addition to the Dooin you are seeking.  It was altered in some way post-production.  I would guess that whatever adhesive was used to put it into a scrapbook reacted with the ink to give the interesting effect it has.

[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=190293[/url]
